articles.description: Lockdown life means more Britons have started to repair and reuse clothes instead of expecting regular new purchases
articles.content:
Britons are becoming more used to repairing and reusing clothes and increasing numbers are keen to keep doing so even after shops reopen.
In a threat to the growth of fast fashion, more than one-thi… [+843 chars]
